Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
The "Source search" app allows to search resources in OpenCms and programmatically replace parts of the content.

It displays it's results in an explorer-like list. That enables you to work on this results directly. Which is of great value.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: The "Source search" app allows to search resources in OpenCms and work on the results directly. Optionally you can replace parts of the content programmatically as well.
